item.description:
Hi Packers,

This is the date we have been waiting for all season when the Pack take on the Giants at Lambeau field in the 1st of hopefully 3 playoff games, for last years playoff run we had huge crowds and got busy early, we will have the 2nd floor open for any early birds at 3pm, the game will also play on the 1st floor, so please get here early if you want a seat upstairs. All packer fans are welcome so please wear you favorite jersey, cheese head hat, even paint your face if you want, enjoy the rest of your week, see you all on Sunday.

As usual any and all suggestions / comments welcome.

Best,

Ray Butler

group.name: The Boston Green Bay Packers Meetup Group

item.name: Green Bay Packers v NY Giants
